summary:
Artifact Effect Perk replaces the Extra Effect Perk. Simply, it enables adding three enchantments on the item instead of default two.

Read the included \"FluxMOD_Readme.html\" for further information about the mod
descriptionHtml:
Artifact Effect Perk replaces the Extra Effect Perk. Simply, it enables adding three enchantments on the item instead of default two.

Read the included \"FluxMOD_Readme.html\" for further information about the mod.

Perk: Artifact Effect
Description: Can put three enchantments on the same item making it the Artifact.
Level Req: 40
author: argie
